categories: Category:Confederacy of Independent Systems starship classes

nodes.text: The Storm Fleet destroyer was a destroyer model made by Kuat Drive Yards for the Separatists during the Clone Wars.

The destroyer was clad with dull, black durasteel plating.
Each ship was armed with quad laser cannons and proton torpedo launchers.

The Storm Fleet consisted of these vessels and used their combined firepower to subjugate neutral worlds and take their resources and/or facilities. They were disguised as massive freighters in order to travel relatively safely to their targets. Anakin Skywalker and Obi-Wan Kenobi managed to destroy the fleet with the help of their clone pilots a few months after the First Battle of Geonosis.
